verses.verse: And the whole congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> assembled themselves together <WH6950> at Shiloh <WH7887>, and set up <WH7931> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> there <WH776>: and the land was subdued <WH3533> before them <WH6440>.
And there remained <WH3498> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> seven <WH7651> tribes <WH7626>, which had not yet divided <WH2505> their inheritance <WH5159>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, How long are ye slack <WH7503> to go <WH935> in to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1>, hath given you <WH5414>?

Appoint <WH3051> for you three <WH7969> men <WH582> of each tribe <WH7626>: and I will send <WH7971> them <WH6965>, and they shall arise, and walk <WH1980> through the land <WH776>, and describe <WH3789> it according <WH6310> to their inheritance <WH5159>; and they shall come unto me <WH935>.

And they shall divide <WH2505> it into seven <WH7651> portions <WH2506>: Judah <WH3063> shall abide <WH5975> in his border <WH1366> on the south <WH5045>, and the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> shall abide <WH5975> in their border <WH1366> on the north <WH6828>.

And ye shall describe <WH3789> the land <WH776> into seven <WH7651> portions <WH2506>, and bring <WH935> the description hither to me <WH3384>; and I will cast lots <WH1486> for you here before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>.

For the Levites <WH3881> have no portion <WH2506> among <WH7130> you <WH3550>; for the priesthood of Jehovah <WH3068> is their inheritance <WH5159>: and Gad <WH1410> and Reuben <WH7205> and the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>, which Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068> gave them <WH5414>.

And the men <WH582> arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212>: and Joshua <WH3091> charged <WH6680> them that went <WH1980> to describe <WH3789> the land <WH776>, saying <WH559>, Go <WH3212> and walk <WH1980> through the land <WH776>, and describe <WH3789> it <WH7725>, and come again to me <WH7993>; and I will cast lots <WH1486> for you here before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> in Shiloh <WH7887>.

And the men <WH582> went <WH3212> and passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776>, and described <WH3789> it by cities <WH5892> into seven <WH7651> portions <WH2506> in a book <WH5612>; and they came <WH935> to Joshua <WH3091> unto the camp <WH4264> at Shiloh <WH7887>.

And Joshua <WH3091> cast <WH7993> lots <WH1486> for them in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and there Joshua <WH3091> divided <WH2505> the land <WH776> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256>.

And the lot <WH1486> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> came up <WH5927> according to their families <WH4940>: and the border <WH1366> of their lot <WH1486> went out <WH3318> between the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> and the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>.

And their border <WH1366> on the north <WH6828> quarter <WH6285> was from the Jordan <WH3383>; and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to the side <WH3802> of Jericho <WH3405> on the north <WH6828>, and went up <WH5927> through the hill-country <WH2022> westward <WH3220>; and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were at the wilderness <WH4057> of Beth-aven <WH1007>.

And the border <WH1366> passed <WH5674> along from thence to Luz <WH3870>, to the side <WH3802> of Luz <WH3870> (the same is Beth-el <WH1008>), southward <WH5045>; and the border <WH1366> went down <WH3381> to Ataroth-addar <WH5853>, by the mountain <WH2022> that lieth on the south <WH5045> of Beth-horon <WH1032> the nether <WH8481>.

And the border <WH1366> extended <WH8388> thence <WH5437>, and turned about on the west <WH3220> quarter <WH6285> southward <WH5045>, from the mountain <WH2022> that lieth before <WH6440> Beth-horon <WH1032> southward <WH5045>; and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were at Kiriath-baal <WH7154> (the same is Kiriath-jearim <WH7157>), a city <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>: this was the west <WH3220> quarter <WH6285>.

And the south <WH5045> quarter <WH6285> was from the uttermost <WH7097> part of Kiriath-jearim <WH7157>; and the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> westward <WH3220>, and went out <WH3318> to the fountain <WH4599> of the waters <WH4325> of Nephtoah <WH5318>;

and the border <WH1366> went down <WH3381> to the uttermost <WH7097> part of the mountain <WH2022> that lieth before <WH6440> the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011>, which is in the vale <WH6010> of Rephaim <WH7497> northward <WH6828>; and it went down <WH3381> to the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom <WH2011>, to the side <WH3802> of the Jebusite <WH2983> southward <WH5045>, and went down <WH3381> to En-rogel <WH5883>;

and it extended <WH8388> northward <WH6828>, and went out <WH3318> at En-shemesh <WH5885>, and went out <WH3318> to Geliloth <WH1553>, which is over against <WH5227> the ascent <WH4608> of Adummim <WH131>; and it went down <WH3381> to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>;
and it passed along <WH5674> to the side <WH3802> over against <WH4136> the Arabah <WH6160> northward <WH6828>, and went down <WH3381> unto the Arabah <WH6160>;

and the border <WH1366> passed along <WH5674> to the side <WH3802> of Beth-hoglah <WH1031> northward <WH6828>; and the goings <WH8444> out of the border <WH1366> were at the north <WH6828> bay <WH3956> of the Salt <WH4417> Sea <WH3220>, at the south <WH5045> end <WH7097> of the Jordan <WH3383>: this was the south <WH5045> border <WH1366>.

And the Jordan <WH3383> was the border <WH1379> of it on the east <WH6924> quarter <WH6285>. This was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, by the borders <WH1367> thereof round about <WH5439>, according to their families <WH4940>.

Now the cities <WH5892> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families <WH4940> were Jericho <WH3405>, and Beth-hoglah <WH1031>, and <WH6010> Emek-keziz <WH7104>,
and Beth-arabah <WH1026>, and Zemaraim <WH6787>, and Beth-el <WH1008>,
and Avvim <WH5761>, and Parah <WH6511>, and Ophrah <WH6084>,
and Chephar-ammoni <WH3726>, and Ophni <WH6078>, and Geba <WH1387>; twelve <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Gibeon <WH1391>, and Ramah <WH7414>, and Beeroth <WH881>,
and Mizpeh <WH4708>, and Chephirah <WH3716>, and Mozah <WH4681>,
and Rekem <WH7552>, and Irpeel <WH3416>, and Taralah <WH8634>,

and Zelah <WH6762>, Eleph <WH507>, and the Jebusite <WH2983> (the same is Jerusalem <WH3389>), Gibeath <WH1394>, and Kiriath <WH7157>; fourteen <WH702> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families <WH4940>.
